mapper.select: select t.book_price_for_sale * t.item_cnt as orders_total, o.orders_date, t.* from orders o inner join (select b.book_title, b.BOOK_IMG, oi.item_cnt, b.book_price_for_sale, oi.orders_status, oi.orders_no from orders_item oi inner join book b on oi.isbn = b.isbn) t on o.orders_no = t.orders_no where o.user_id=#{user_id} order by orders_date desc
select * from orders where user_id=#{user_id} order by orders_date desc
select count(*) from coupon_no where user_id=#{user_id} and coupon_available='t'
